meanings.definition: A passage for walking, as between rows of seats.
meanings.sent1: The gangways in the theater allow people to move between seats easily.
meanings.sent2: Please use the gangways to reach your seat without disturbing others.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the gangways became a popular spot for sneaking snacks.
meanings.sent4: In the classroom, the gangways symbolize the path to knowledge and learning.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights along the gangways make the theater feel magical.

meanings.definition: A narrow platform or walkway providing access to a ship or aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The crew members hurried along the gangways to board the ship.
meanings.sent2: Passengers lined up orderly on the gangways to embark on the cruise.
meanings.sent3: The seagull perched on the gangways, pretending to be a ship captain.
meanings.sent4: The gangways connecting the planes to the terminal resemble bridges to new adventures.
meanings.sent5: The salty breeze on the gangways signaled the start of the ocean voyage.
